settings.name: Kimberly Berg
settings.feedback_content: So happy with my purchase of Good Vibes box and Selenite charging bowl. They are both so beautiful and the rose water smells so wonderful on my pillow at night. My amethyst crystal is absolutely beautiful. Highly recommend U&M and customer service can’t be beat!
